snippet: As the Winter Olympics kick off in Sochi, security concerns linger. The Congressional Budget Office released a report this week on workforce shrinkage due to the Affordable Care Act. Both topics will dominate the Sunday shows conversation.
abstract: As the Winter Olympics kick off in Sochi, security concerns linger. The Congressional Budget Office released a report this week on workforce shrinkage due to the Affordable Care Act. Both topics will dominate the Sunday shows conversation.
